alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Smoke Advisory issued March 11 at 9:05PM EDT until March 12 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility of 3 miles or less in dense smoke. * WHERE...Leon County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of dense smoke will create hazardous driving conditions this evening and overnight due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lingering smoke from a controlled burn south of the Tallahassee International Airport has drifted northward into Tallahassee this evening. As surface winds diminish the smoke will likely settle near the ground, creating pockets of reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Persons with respiratory illnesses should remain indoors to avoid inhaling smoke. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
